org.lobobrowser.html.renderer

Class RSpacing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lobobrowser.html.renderer.BaseRenderable
      • org.lobobrowser.html.renderer.BaseBoundableRenderable
        • org.lobobrowser.html.renderer.RSpacing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoundableRenderable, Renderable

    public final class RSpacing
extends BaseBoundableRenderable
    This is used when there's padding or margins in inline elements.

      • paintSelection

        public boolean paintSelection(java.awt.Graphics g,
                              boolean inSelection,
                              RenderableSpot startPoint,
                              RenderableSpot endPoint)
        Description copied from interface: BoundableRenderable
        Asks the Renderable to paint the selection between two points. Nothing will be done if the points are outside the Renderable.
        Parameters:
        g - the g
        inSelection - the in selection
        startPoint - the start point
        endPoint - the end point
        Returns:
        True iff it's in selection when finished painting.
